msg.msgText: A record with handle 0x{0} (identifier: {1} type {2} ({3})) could not be recovered for reason {4} ({5})

msgExplanation.p: The data in the persistent data store is inconsistent and could not be recovered. Depending on recovery settings, this will cause recovery to be aborted or the problematic records to be discarded.

msgUserResponse.p: If inconsistent data is preventing the server from starting one or more of the following actions may be appropriate:
i) Changing the setting Server.TolerateRecoveryInconsistencies to true will attempt to recover as much data as possible though some data loss may occur
ii) Performing a clean store operation to wipe the persistent data store
iii) Contact an IBM service representative
